explanation: 这篇论文研究了海表温度（SST）对海盐气溶胶（SSA）形成及其气候效应的 underestimated 作用。研究者开发了一个温度可控的SSA模拟装置，从SSA粒径分布和有机物富集两个方面研究了SST的影响。结果表明，随着SST降低，SSA粒径减小，爱特肯模式的SSA增加，而累积和粗模态的SSA减少。SST能显著增强SSA颗粒中的有机物富集，其增加倍数取决于有机物种类和SSA粒径。研究预测，与暖水相比，冷水（0°C）中，受Aitken模态SSA影响的云凝结核（CCN）贡献显著增加。此外，该研究首次将SST纳入SSA排放溶解有机碳（DOC）的全球通量估算中，估算值为23.45至55.78 Tg C yr⁻¹。与以往研究相比，该研究揭示了SST在影响云形成和SSA的大气有机物负荷方面的关键作用。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它研究了SSA的物理和化学特性及其对气候的影响，这些特性可以通过卫星观测和空气质量监测来研究。
topic_words: ['Sea spray aerosol', 'Sea surface temperature', 'Aerosol particle size distribution', 'Cloud condensation nuclei', 'Dissolved organic carbon', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Climate effects']
authors: Jie Hu;Jianlong Li;Narcisse Tsona Tchinda;Yaru Song;Minglan Xu;Kun Li;Lin Du
title: Underestimated role of sea surface temperature in sea spray aerosol formation and climate effects
abstract:
Underestimated role of sea surface temperature in sea spray aerosol formation and climate effects 
 The uncertainty regarding the correlation between sea spray aerosol (SSA) formation and sea surface temperature (SST) hinders the accurate estimation of SSA’s impact on global climate. Here, we developed a temperature-controlled plunging SSA simulation tank to investigate the impact of SST on SSA formation from two perspectives: SSA particle size distribution and organic enrichment. Our findings show that SSA particle size decreases with decreasing SST, as exhibited by an increase in SSA within Aitken mode and a decrease in SSA within accumulation and coarse modes. SST can significantly enhance organic enrichment in SSA particles, while the multiplicative increases vary from 2 to 10 times depending on the organic matter species and the SSA particle size. Based on our experimental results, it is predicted that SST reduction may lead to a significantly higher contribution of Aitken modal SSA-derived CCN in cold waters (0 °C) than in warm waters (30 °C). Additionally, we incorporate SST for the first time in estimating the global flux of dissolved organic carbon (DOC) emitted via SSA, yielding a value ranging from 23.45 to 55.78 Tg C yr−1. Compared to previous works, our study reveals the crucial role of SST in influencing both cloud formation and the atmospheric organic burden of SSA.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 这篇论文研究了热带生态系统中植被总初级生产力（GPP）的时空变化及其驱动因素。它利用遥感技术，特别是高分辨率的植被指数和多层土壤水文模型，模拟了海南岛2000年至2020年期间每月30米分辨率的GPP。研究发现，大部分地区GPP显著增加，并揭示了水汽、温度和辐射等环境因素对GPP的影响，以及这些因素的滞后效应。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测数据（遥感数据）来监测植被的GPP，这与大气碳循环和气候变化密切相关。高分辨率的时空模拟提高了对碳循环过程的理解，对气候变化研究和碳汇管理具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['Vegetation Gross Primary Productivity (GPP)', 'Remote Sensing', 'Satellite observation', 'Carbon Cycle', 'Climate Change', 'High-resolution', 'Spatiotemporal variations']
authors: Ruize Xu;Jiahua Zhang;Fang Chen;Bo Yu;Shawkat Ali;Hidayat Ullah;Ali Salem Al-Sakkaf
title: Quantitative assessment of spatiotemporal variations and drivers of gross primary productivity in tropical ecosystems at higher resolution
abstract:
•An improved BEPS model achieved high spatiotemporal resolution simulation of GPP. •98.5 % of vegetated areas had increase in GPP, with an annual rise of 437.02 g C/m2. •Considering compound and lagged effects of various factors boost GPP explanation. •Relative humidity had stronger effect on GPP than precipitation and soil moisture. •More GPP were affected by the lag effects of radiation and surface temperature. 
 Climate change significantly impacts vegetation gross primary productivity (GPP), yet uncertainties persist in the carbon cycle of tropical terrestrial ecosystems due to incomplete consideration of productivity drivers and lag effects. To address this, we developed a remote sensing-based process model by integrating high-resolution vegetation indices and multi-layer soil hydrological module, to simulate monthly GPP at a 30 m resolution across Hainan Island from 2000 to 2020. The finer GPP can capture more spatial details and show higher accuracy at site scales (R = 0.79 and NRMSE = 14.79 %). Trend analysis and Hurst exponent were used to reveal spatiotemporal dynamics and sustainability of GPP. Meanwhile, nonlinear Granger causality tests quantified both concurrent and lagged correlations between various environmental factors and GPP. The results indicated significant GPP increases across 98.5 % of vegetated areas, with an annual rise of 437.02 g C/m2, and a marked improvement in trends around 2011. Future projections suggest sustained high GPP sustainability (Hurst = 0.53), and reducing “positive-inconsistent” areas in the northeast and southwest is crucial for enhancing local carbon sinks. Furthermore, water availability, temperature, and radiation were primary drivers of GPP changes, affecting 53.55 %, 27.77 %, and 14.43 % of vegetated areas, respectively, with their compounded effects enhancing explanatory power by 35.84 %. Relative humidity dominated water availability impacts on GPP (10.02 % to 79.98 % variation), surpassing precipitation and soil moisture impacts. Lag effects were observed in 68.83 % of vegetated areas, with 1 to 4-month delays in responses to net solar radiation and surface temperature, especially in forest and shrubland ecosystems. This study provides deeper insights into fine-scale GPP simulations and analysis of climate interactions, which are crucial for effective carbon cycle management in tropical ecosystems.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了北极海冰减少对北印度洋海温的影响。文章指出，北极海冰减少可以通过三种途径影响北印度洋海温：大气环流、西太平洋海温以及青藏高原陆地。首先，北极海冰减少会引发从北大西洋到北印度洋的大气遥相关波列和环流异常；其次，北极海冰减少会诱导从北极经欧亚大陆到西太平洋的波列传播，导致南海反气旋异常和海温上升；第三，北极海冰减少会增强跨赤道气流。 这项研究利用了卫星观测数据和气候模式数据，揭示了北极和热带印度洋之间联系，加深了我们对气候变化的理解。研究中涉及到的卫星观测数据很可能包括用于监测海温、海冰和大气环流的卫星数据，例如NOAA卫星、Aqua/Terra卫星等。
topic_words: ['Sea surface temperature', 'Atmospheric circulation', 'Satellite observations', 'Climate change', 'Arctic sea ice']
authors: Xiaojing Li;Jie Zhang;Xinyu Fang;Xizi Rao
title: Reduction in Arctic sea ice amplifies the warming of the northern Indian Ocean
abstract:
•We found the transfer station where the Arctic affects the IO SST, expanding the study of Arctic-tropical links; •There are three ways to influence the Arctic sea ice on the NIO SST: the atmosphere, the western Pacific SST and the TP; •The future changes of these three approaches are predicted under the SSP245 scenario of CMIP6 from 2015 to 2045. 
 The sea surface temperature (SST) in the tropical Indian Ocean(IO) has experienced rapid warming over the past 40 years. The reason for this phenomenon is still debated. Our study suggests that the decrease in Arctic sea ice during winter can influence the warming of SST in the Northern Indian Ocean (NIO) through three main pathway including atmospheric circulation, western Pacific SST and Tibet Plateau land. Firstly, the reduction of Arctic sea ice can trigger atmospheric teleconnection wave trains and circulation anomalies from the North Atlantic to the NIO, leading to anticyclone anomaly in the Bay of Bengal(BOB) that increases thermal contribution by radiation warming, as well as cyclonic anomalies in the Arabian Sea(AS) that increases dynamic contribution by warm current transport. Secondly, the reduction of Arctic sea ice can induce a wave train propagating from the Arctic through Eurasia to the western Pacific, resulting in anticyclone anomalies and SST rise in the South China Sea, thus enhancing the dynamic contribution of heat transfer through the Indonesian through flow(ITF). Thirdly,Arctic sea ice can enhances cross-equatorial flow by inducing warm surface temperature of the Tibetan Plateau.These three pathways will still exist until 2045 in future SSP245 emission scenarios.This study establishes a connection between the Arctic and the tropical IO, expanding our understanding of the relationship between these regions.

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要表明，其研究内容与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。论文关注的是印度地区春季地表气温的两年期变化规律。要研究地表气温的变化，需要用到遥感技术，特别是卫星遥感技术。气象卫星搭载的传感器能够观测地表温度，并通过反演算法获取地表气温数据。因此，论文的研究方法很可能涉及到卫星遥感数据处理、温度反演等技术。此外，对地表气温的长期观测和分析，也有助于气候监测和预测，以及对大气动力学过程的理解。总的来说，该研究利用遥感技术研究了与大气环境相关的关键参数——地表气温，这与大气环境遥感技术的研究方向高度一致。
topic_words: ['Surface air temperature', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Meteorological satellites', 'Temperature retrieval', 'Climate monitoring', 'Atmospheric dynamics', 'India']
authors: Kethavath Lakshma;Gopinadh Konda;J.S. Chowdary;C. Gnanaseelan
title: Biennial variability of boreal spring surface air temperature over India

explanation: 这篇论文研究了人为变暖对美国西部干旱的影响。其核心论点是：自2000年以来，气温上升导致蒸发量增加，成为美国西部干旱加剧的主要驱动因素，超过了降水减少的影响。研究利用观测数据和气候模型模拟，证实了人为变暖导致蒸发需求增加，从而加剧干旱的结论。2020-2022年的美国西部特大干旱是这一转变的典型案例。研究预测，在高排放情景下，类似的干旱事件发生频率将显著增加。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它依赖于卫星观测（例如地表温度、蒸散发和降水）以及气候模型模拟来分析大气成分（如水汽）的变化，从而监测和评估干旱。
topic_words: ['Temperature', 'Evapotranspiration', 'Drought monitoring', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Climate modeling', 'Surface temperature', 'Atmospheric water vapor', 'Precipitation']
authors: Yizhou Zhuang;Rong Fu;Joel Lisonbee;Amanda M. Sheffield;Britt A. Parker;Genoveva Deheza
title: Anthropogenic warming has ushered in an era of temperature-dominated droughts in the western United States
abstract: Historically, meteorological drought in the western United States (WUS) has been driven primarily by precipitation deficits. However, our observational analysis shows that, since around 2000, rising surface temperature and the resulting high evaporative demand have contributed more to drought severity (62%) and coverage (66%) over the WUS than precipitation deficit. This increase in evaporative demand during droughts, mostly attributable to anthropogenic warming according to analyses of both observations and climate model simulations, is the main cause of the increased drought severity and coverage. The unprecedented 2020–2022 WUS drought exemplifies this shift in drought drivers, with high evaporative demand accounting for 61% of its severity, compared to 39% from precipitation deficit. Climate model simulations corroborate this shift and project that, under the fossil-fueled development scenario (SSP5-8.5), droughts like the 2020–2022 event will transition from a one-in-more-than-a-thousand-year event in the pre-2022 period to a 1-in-60-year event by the mid-21st century and to a 1-in-6-year event by the late-21st century.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了2022-2023年华东地区山黄大气边界层生态环境观象台（ABLECAS）的CO和CO2浓度变化，并分析了其比值（ΔCO/ΔCO2）与不同气团来源的关系。研究发现，CO和CO2的混合比具有明显的季节变化，冬季和春季较高，这主要归因于来自长江以北地区的频繁输送。通过使用FLEXPART模型进行源-受体关系分析，研究评估了不同气团的潜在源区和贡献，并发现2018-2019年期间气团足迹发生了明显的转变，北极涛动强度和西太平洋副热带高压位置的异常变化对污染物传输模式起着关键作用。该研究使用了地面观测数据和模型模拟相结合的方法，重点关注大气成分分析（CO和CO2）以及污染物传输，与大气环境遥感技术中的地面空气质量监测和大气成分分析密切相关，但未直接涉及卫星观测数据。
topic_words: ['CO', 'CO2', 'air quality monitoring', 'ground-based observation', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'source apportionment', 'FLEXPART model', 'pollutant transport']
authors: Jing Ye;Yuting Zhang;Weijie Yao;Hang Liu;Shandong Lei;Yinzhou Zhang;Junbo Zhang;Sinan Li;Song Lv;Lin Wu;Xiao Tang;Yele Sun;Jinyuan Xin;Jie Li;Zifa Wang;Lanzhong Liu;Hang Su;Xiaole Pan
title: Significant shift of footprint patterns and pollutant source contributions: insights from observations at Shanghuang observatory, East China
abstract: As two of the most important products of the combustion process, carbon dioxide (CO2) and carbon monoxide (CO) are commonly used as tracers for combustion source assignment. Their relationship will help to better understand the regional carbon cycle and assess climate forcing effects. In this study, mixing ratios of CO2 and CO were continuously measured using a Picarro gas concentration analyzer at the Atmospheric Boundary Layer Eco-Environmental Shanghuang Observatory, Chinese Academy of Sciences (ABLECAS) throughout 2022–2023. The variability of the mixing ratio of CO to CO2 (ΔCO/ΔCO2) in a 1 h time interval was calculated based on linear slope analysis after background values were determined and subtracted. The results showed that the mixing ratio of CO had a clear seasonal variability with a moderate increase in the spring (249.1 ± 59.6 part per billion (ppb)) and winter (257.8 ± 90.3 ppb), mostly due to more frequent transport from north of the Yangtze River. ΔCO/ΔCO2 at the ABLECAS varied with air mass origin, with a linear slope 0%–1% on a 1 h basis. Relatively high ΔCO/ΔCO2 values for an air mass from the north in the winter indicate that the emission sources had lower combustion efficiency. In summer, the ΔCO/ΔCO2 ratio mostly reflected the background conditions for air masses from marine areas. The potential source regions and contribution assignments were evaluatedat the ABLECAS according to source–receptor relationship analysis using the FLEXPART model with CO as a pollutant tracer from 2015 to 2023. We found that the footprint of an air mass had a clear transition period between 2018 and 2019, and a synoptic anomaly, related to Arctic Oscillation strength and west Pacific subtropical high position, plays a key role in influencing the pollutant transport patterns. This study provides a scientific basis for the formulation of air quality regulation policy, and helps to implement the national carbon neutralization strategy.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了非迁移日潮对中层大气和低热层钠 (Na) 层的影响。它利用Odin卫星上的光谱仪和红外成像系统(OSIRIS)的观测数据以及包含金属化学成分的特定动力学全大气社区气候模型 (SD-WACCM) 的模拟结果，首次定量评估了非迁移日潮对Na层密度的影响。研究发现，Na密度呈现明显的经度变化，与温度潮汐信号显著相关。在不同高度，Na密度对温度潮汐的响应存在差异，这揭示了大气动力学过程对金属层分布的复杂影响。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测数据研究大气成分(Na)的时空变化，并分析了大气动力学过程对大气成分的影响。
topic_words: ['Atmospheric composition', 'Satellite observations', 'Na layer', 'Mesosphere and lower thermosphere', 'Optical Spectrograph and InfraRed Imaging System (OSIRIS)', 'Airglow', 'Tidal effects', 'Atmospheric dynamics']
authors: Jianfei Wu;Wuhu Feng;Xianghui Xue;Daniel Robert Marsh;John Maurice Campbell Plane
title: Effects of nonmigrating diurnal tides on the Na layer in the mesosphere and lower thermosphere
abstract:
Metal layers occur in the mesosphere and lower thermosphere region 80–120 km from the ablation of cosmic dust. Nonmigrating diurnal tides are persistent global oscillations. We investigate nonmigrating diurnal tidal variations in metal layers using satellite observations and global climate model simulations; these have not been studied previously due to the limitations of measurements. The nonmigrating diurnal tides in temperature are strongly linked to the corresponding change in metal layers. 
 The influence of nonmigrating diurnal tides on Na layer variability in the mesosphere and lower thermosphere regions is investigated for the first time using data from the Optical Spectrograph and InfraRed Imaging System (OSIRIS) on the Odin satellite and Specified Dynamics Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (SD-WACCM) with metal chemistry. The Na density from OSIRIS exhibits a clear longitudinal variation indicative of the presence of tidal components. Similar variability is seen in the SD-WACCM result. Analysis shows a significant relationship between the nonmigrating diurnal tides in Na density and the corresponding temperature tidal signal. Below 90 km, the three nonmigrating diurnal tidal components in Na density show a significant positive correlation with the temperature tides. Conversely, the phase mainly indicates a negative correlation above 95 km. Around the metal layer peak, the response of the Na density to a 1 K change in tidal temperature is estimated to be 120 cm−3.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用多种雷达高度计数据（ERS-2，Envisat和CryoSat-2）构建1995年至2023年北极海冰厚度产品的技术。该研究使用了创新的数据处理方法，包括海冰裂隙探测、自由板厚度转换和多任务偏差校正等。最终生成的北极海冰厚度数据集具有5公里空间分辨率，并与来自向上探测声纳、Operation IceBridge机载激光高度计以及其他七个公开发布的北极海冰厚度产品进行了比较验证。研究结果表明，该产品在时间序列、空间分辨率和精度方面均表现良好，精度在0.2米到0.4米之间，这对于研究北极气候变化和海冰动态具有重要意义。该研究属于大气环境遥感技术范畴，因为它利用卫星遥感技术（雷达高度计）观测海冰厚度，并应用于气候变化研究。
topic_words: ['Sea ice thickness', 'Radar altimetry', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Arctic climate change', 'ERS-2', 'Envisat', 'CryoSat-2', 'Operation IceBridge']
authors: Feng Xiao;Shengkai Zhang;Jiaxing Li;Tong Geng;Tingguo Lu;Hui Luo;Fei Li
title: A monthly Arctic sea ice thickness product from 1995 to 2023 using multiple radar altimetry data
abstract:
In this study, we developed a new Arctic sea ice thickness (SIT) product for the period from 1995 to 2023 by combining multiple radar altimetry data. The SIT dataset is compared with observations from upward-looking sonars and airborne laser altimetry from Operation IceBridge, as well as seven publicly released Arctic SIT products. Generally, the newly developed SIT product shows good performance in terms of time series, spatial resolution, and accuracy compared with existing products. 
 Arctic sea ice plays a crucial role in studies of regional and global climate change. Satellite observations have shown that the extent of Arctic sea ice has been declining over the last four decades. However, long-term variations in Arctic sea ice thickness (SIT) have received less attention because SIT cannot be measured directly by satellite-based instruments. Here, we present a monthly Arctic SIT product based on multiple radar altimetry observations from ERS-2, Envisat, and CryoSat-2. To ensure the accuracy of the SIT retrievals, a novel data processing method is proposed, including leads detection, freeboard conversion to thickness, and inter-mission bias correction. Finally, the monthly SIT estimates for the Arctic Ocean from October 1995 to December 2023 are generated. The thickness estimates are posted on a 5 km resolution polar stereographic grid. The variations in Arctic SIT are analyzed in terms of spatial and temporal distributions. Furthermore, the SIT estimates are compared with observations from upward-looking sonars and airborne laser altimetry from Operation IceBridge, as well as seven publicly released Arctic SIT products. The validation results demonstrate that our SIT product has accuracy equivalent to existing products. The accuracy of our products varies from 0.2 m to 0.4 m according to the input satellite altimetry data. The SIT datasets are available on the Zenodo at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13699698 (Xiao et al., 2024).

explanation: 这篇论文研究了船舶排放气溶胶的扩散率，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。研究使用拉格朗日粒子模型和大型涡模拟，模拟了不同气象条件下（包括降水和非降水边界层）船舶排放气溶胶羽流的扩散。该模型可以预测气溶胶羽流的扩散速率，这对于评估海洋云增亮（MCB）等气候干预技术的影响至关重要。论文中涉及的气溶胶、云、海洋边界层等都是大气环境遥感技术关注的重点，而对羽流扩散的模拟结果，可以为利用卫星观测数据反演气溶胶分布提供参考，并用于评估气候干预措施的效果。
topic_words: ['Aerosol', 'Cloud', 'Marine boundary layer', 'Climate intervention', 'Ship tracks', 'Plume dispersion', 'Large-eddy simulation (LES)', 'Lagrangian particle model', 'Satellite observation of aerosols']
authors: Lucas A. McMichael;Michael J. Schmidt;Robert Wood;Peter N. Blossey;Lekha Patel
title: Exploring ship track spreading rates with a physics-informed Langevin particle parameterization
abstract:
Marine cloud brightening (MCB) is a climate intervention technique to potentially cool the climate. Climate models used to gauge regional climate impacts associated with MCB often assume large areas of the ocean are uniformly perturbed. However, a more realistic representation of MCB application would require information about how an injected particle plume spreads. This work aims to develop such a plume-spreading model. 
 The rate at which aerosols spread from a point source injection, such as from a ship or other stationary pollution source, is critical for accurately representing subgrid plume spreading in a climate model. Such climate model results will guide future decisions regarding the feasibility and application of large-scale intentional marine cloud brightening (MCB). Prior modeling studies have shown that the rate at which ship plumes spread may be strongly dependent on meteorological conditions, such as precipitating versus non-precipitating boundary layers and shear. In this study, we apply a Lagrangian particle model (PM-ABL v1.0), governed by a Langevin stochastic differential equation, to create a simplified framework for predicting the rate of spreading from a ship-injected aerosol plume in sheared, precipitating, and non-precipitating boundary layers. The velocity and position of each stochastic particle is predicted with the acceleration of each particle being driven by the turbulent kinetic energy, dissipation rate, momentum variance, and mean wind. These inputs to the stochastic particle velocity equation are derived from high-fidelity large-eddy simulations (LES) equipped with a prognostic aerosol–cloud microphysics scheme (UW-SAM) to simulate an aerosol injection from a ship into a cloud-topped marine boundary layer. The resulting spreading rate from the reduced-order stochastic model is then compared to the spreading rate in the LES. The stochastic particle velocity representation is shown to reasonably reproduce spreading rates in sheared, precipitating, and non-precipitating cases using domain-averaged turbulent statistics from the LES.

explanation: 这篇论文介绍了一种新的全球尺度空气质量模拟系统MPAS-CMAQ，它结合了MPAS气象模型和CMAQ空气质量模型。该系统能够模拟臭氧和PM2.5等大气成分，并在高性能计算环境下具有良好的可扩展性。研究者利用该系统进行了全球模拟，并与地面观测数据进行了比较，评估了模型的性能。虽然文章没有直接提及卫星遥感技术，但其模拟结果可用于评估卫星观测数据的准确性，也可为改进空气质量监测和预测提供支持。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['air quality', 'ozone', 'PM2.5', 'global scale modeling', 'ground surface networks', 'air quality monitoring', 'model evaluation']
authors: David C. Wong;Jeff Willison;Jonathan E. Pleim;Golam Sarwar;James Beidler;Russ Bullock;Jerold A. Herwehe;Rob Gilliam;Daiwen Kang;Christian Hogrefe;George Pouliot;Hosein Foroutan
title: Development of the MPAS-CMAQ coupled system (V1.0) for multiscale global air quality modeling
abstract:
This work describe how we linked the meteorological Model for Prediction Across Scales – Atmosphere (MPAS-A) with the Community Multiscale Air Quality (CMAQ) air quality model to form a coupled modelling system. This could be used to study air quality or climate and air quality interaction at a global scale. This new model scales well in high-performance computing environments and performs well with respect to ground surface networks in terms of ozone and PM2.5. 
 The Community Multiscale Air Quality (CMAQ) model has been used for regulatory purposes at the U.S. EPA and in the research community for decades. In 2012, we released the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF)-CMAQ coupled model that enables aerosol information from CMAQ to affect meteorological processes through direct effects on shortwave radiation. Both CMAQ and WRF-CMAQ are considered limited-area models. Recently, we have extended domain coverage to the global scale by linking the meteorological Model for Prediction Across Scales – Atmosphere (MPAS-A, hereafter referred simply to as MPAS) with CMAQ to form the MPAS-CMAQ global coupled model. To configure these three different models, i.e., CMAQ (offline), WRF-CMAQ, and MPAS-CMAQ, we have developed the Advanced Air Quality Modeling System (AAQMS) for constructing each of them effortlessly. We evaluate this newly built MPAS-CMAQ coupled model using two global configurations: a 120 km uniform mesh and a 92–25 km variable mesh with the finer area over North America. Preliminary computational tests show good scalability and model evaluation, when using a 3-year simulation (2014–2016) for the uniform mesh case and a monthly simulation of January and July 2016 for the variable mesh case, on ozone and PM2.5 and show reasonable performance with respect to observations. The 92–25 km configuration has a high bias in wintertime surface ozone across the United States, and this bias is consistent with the 120 km result. Summertime surface ozone in the 92–25 km configuration is less biased than the 120 km case. The MPAS-CMAQ system reasonably reproduces the daily variability of daily average PM from the Air Quality System (AQS) network.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了在潮湿环境中通过碳掺杂增强氧化物分解的方法。其核心在于通过破坏莫来石YMn2O5中的氢键网络来提高其催化分解臭氧的能力。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为臭氧是大气成分的重要组成部分，其浓度变化直接关系到空气质量。研究成果可以应用于改进大气成分分析和空气质量监测技术，例如改进相关卫星传感器对臭氧的探测精度和灵敏度，从而更准确地监测和预测臭氧污染。
topic_words: ['ozone', 'air quality', 'catalytic decomposition', 'mullite', 'carbon doping', 'hydrogen bond', 'remote sensing', 'satellite observation', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Rui Wen;Huan Li;Haojun Zhao;Kai Ren;Ruiting Hao;Kunpeng He;Chunning Zhao;Xiang Wan;Weichao Wang
title: Enhancing Ozone Decomposition in Humid Environments through Carbon Doping to Disrupt the Hydrogen Bond Network in Mullite YMn2O5

explanation: 这篇论文研究了不同类型微塑料在不同老化过程后作为大气中冰核的活性。研究发现，所有类型的微塑料都具有成冰活性，并且老化过程会改变这种活性。部分微塑料的老化导致成冰活性降低，而聚氯乙烯（PVC）的成冰活性却有所提高。这与材料表面化学缺陷的变化有关。红外光谱分析证实了这种关联。研究认为，如果大气中微塑料浓度足够高，它们将成为大气中冰核的重要来源。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为微塑料作为大气气溶胶的一个组成部分，会影响云的形成和气候变化，而这些过程都可以通过卫星遥感和大气成分分析技术进行监测。
topic_words: ['Ice nucleating particles', 'Aerosol', 'Atmospheric composition', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Cloud formation', 'Climate change']
authors: Heidi L. Busse;Devaka Dharmapriya Ariyasena;Jessica Orris;Miriam Arak Freedman
title: Pristine and Aged Microplastics Can Nucleate Ice through Immersion Freezing
abstract: Microplastics (MP) are ubiquitous in the environment; their atmospheric relevance is being increasingly recognized. Because of their atmospheric concentrations, there is the question of whether MP can act as ice nucleating particles in the atmosphere. This study investigates the immersion freezing activity of lab-prepared MP of four different compositions─low density polyethylene (LDPE), polypropylene (PP), poly(vinyl chloride) (PVC), and poly(ethylene terephthalate) (PET)─using droplet freezing assays. The MP are also exposed to ultraviolet light, ozone, sulfuric acid, and ammonium sulfate to mimic environmental aging of the plastics to elucidate the role that these processes play in the ice nucleating activity of MP. Results show that all studied MP act as immersion nuclei, and aging processes can modify this ice nucleating activity, leading, primarily, to decreases in ice nucleating activity for LDPE, PP, and PET. The ice nucleating activity of PVC generally increased following aging, which we attribute to a cleaning of chemical defects present on the surface of the stock material. Chemical changes were monitored with infrared spectroscopy (ATR-FTIR), and the growth of a peak at 1650–1800 cm–1 was associated with a decrease in ice nucleating activity while loss of an existing peak in that region was associated with an increase in ice nucleating activity. The studied MP have ice nucleating activities sufficient to be a non-negligible source of ice nucleating particles in the atmosphere if present in sufficiently high concentrations.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用低成本微型空气传感器监测加纳阿克拉市区空气质量的可行性。研究人员将微型传感器与参考级仪器共同放置，比较了其在估算PM2.5污染物浓度方面的性能。结果表明，经过局部校准后，微型传感器能够以较高的精度和时间分辨率监测PM2.5浓度，并能有效识别当地污染源，例如交通排放和生物质燃烧。该研究强调了微型空气传感器在数据匮乏地区进行高分辨率空气质量监测的潜力，为城市空气质量管理提供了低成本的解决方案。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'PM10', 'air quality monitoring', 'micro air sensor', 'ground-based observation', 'emission source identification', 'local calibration', 'receptor model', 'Accra, Ghana']
authors: Collins Gameli Hodoli;Iq Mead;Frederic Coulon;Cesunica E. Ivey;Victoria Owusu Tawiah;Garima Raheja;James Nimo;Allison Hughes;Achim Haug;Anika Krause;Selina Amoah;Maxwell Sunu;John K. Nyante;Esi Nerquaye Tetteh;Véronique Riffault;Carl Malings
title: Urban Air Quality Management at Low Cost Using Micro Air Sensors: A Case Study from Accra, Ghana
abstract: Urban air quality management is dependent on the availability of local air pollution data. In many major urban centers of Africa, there is limited to nonexistent information on air quality. This is gradually changing in part due to the increasing use of micro air sensors, which have the potential to enable the generation of ground-based air quality data at fine scales for understanding local emission trends. Regional literature on the application of  high-resolution data for emission source identification in this region is limited. In this study a micro air sensor was colocated at the Physics Department, University of Ghana, with a reference grade instrument to evaluate its performance for estimating PM2.5 pollution accurately at fine scales and the value of these data in identification of local sources and their behavior over time. For this study, 15 weeks of data at hourly resolution with approximately 2500 data pairs were generated and analyzed (June 1, 2023, to September 15, 2023). For this time period a coefficient of determination (r2) of 0.83 was generated with a mean absolute error (MAE) of 5.44 μg m–3 between the pre local calibration micro air sensor (i.e., out of the box) and the reference-grade instrument. Following currently accepted best practice methods (see, e.g., PAS4023) a domain specific (i.e., local) calibration factor was generated using a multilinear regression model, and when this factor is applied to the micro air sensor data, a reduction, i.e. improvement, in MAE to 1.43 μg m–3 was found. Daily variation was calculated, a receptor model was applied, and time series plots as a function of wind direction were generated, including PM2.5/PM10 ratio scatter and count plots, to explore the utility of this observational approach for local source identification. The 3 data sets were compared (out of the box, domain calibrated, and reference-grade) and it was found that although there were variations in the data reported, source areas highlighted based on these data were similar, with input from local sources such as traffic emissions and biomass burning. As the temporal resolution of observational data associated with these micro air sensors is higher than for reference grade instruments (primarily due to costs and logistics limitations), they have the potential to provide insight into the complex, often hyperlocalized sources associated with urban areas, such as those found in major African cities.

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要表明，其研究重点是中国20岁以下人群呼吸道感染疾病中，细颗粒物污染的归因负担。研究使用了来自中国不同地区的亚国家级数据，这暗示了研究可能利用了空气质量监测数据，例如地面监测站的数据或卫星遥感数据，来评估不同地区细颗粒物污染的暴露水平。通过分析这些数据与呼吸道感染发病率之间的关系，研究旨在量化细颗粒物污染对儿童呼吸健康的影响，并可能探讨不同地区之间的差异。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术，特别是空气质量监测和卫星观测等密切相关。
topic_words: ['Particulate Matter', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Satellite observation', 'Respiratory Infections', 'Public Health', 'China']
authors: Junchao Duan;Ruiyang Ding;Menglong Li;Jinlei Qi;Peng Yin;Lijun Wang;Zhiwei Sun;Yifei Hu;Maigeng Zhou
title: Subnational Evidence for the Attributable Burden of Respiratory Infections in China’s Population under 20: Challenges from Particulate Matter Pollution

explanation: 这篇论文研究了跨极弧 (Transpolar Arcs, TPAs) 与日侧极光的关系。以往研究认为 TPAs 通常与极尖 (cusp) 对齐，但该研究发现了三个案例，其中 TPAs 的尖端与高纬度日侧极光 (HiLDA) 对齐，而不是极尖。研究利用国防气象卫星计划 (DMSP) 的观测数据，分析了 TPAs 的日侧连接点，发现 HiLDA 的等离子体流动和粒子特征表明其起源于磁层瓣。这表明 TPAs 与日侧极光之间的联系比之前预想的更复杂。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测数据研究高纬大气中的物理现象，特别是极光活动和电离层等离子体。
topic_words: ['Auroral activity', 'Ionospheric plasma', 'High-latitude aurora', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Defense Meteorological Satellite Program (DMSP)']
authors: Maria Chloi Katrougkalou;Anita Kullen;Lei Cai;Lorenz Roth;Yongliang Zhang
title: Transpolar Arcs Are Not Always Cusp‐Aligned: Evidence of HiLDA‐Aligned Arcs
abstract: Transpolar arcs (TPAs) are often cusp‐aligned. Especially when multiple TPAs appear simultaneously, they join at the auroral signature of the cusp. Here we investigate the dayside connection point of TPAs using Defense Meteorological Satellite Program measurements and identify three cases where the tip of the TPA ends in a localized brightening. One is a typical cusp spot with a TPA attached. The cusp appears just poleward of the oval with a near circular shape. In the second case, multiple cusp spots are observed over a 3 MLT wide region, each connected to a TPA. In the third case, the brightening at the tip of a TPA is identified as high‐latitude dayside aurora (HiLDA). Cusp aurora appears between the HiLDA and the duskside oval. Plasma flows and particle characteristics indicate a lobe origin of the HiLDA. Our results indicate a more complicated connection between TPAs and dayside aurora than previously anticipated.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了美国玉米带的氧化亚氮（N2O）排放，这是一种重要的温室气体。研究者利用高塔观测到的N2O的稳定同位素高频数据，结合同位素混合模型和大气反演技术，对该区域N2O排放的来源进行了解析。结果表明，反硝化作用和硝化作用是N2O排放的主要生物地球化学途径，并且间接排放对总排放量贡献显著（超过35%）。研究还发现，自下而上的间接排放量估算值的上限与同位素约束的下限存在差异，需要进一步研究。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用大气中的N2O同位素数据来研究大气成分和排放源，这属于大气成分分析和空气质量监测的范畴。高塔观测可以看作一种地面遥感技术。
topic_words: ['nitrous oxide', 'N2O isotopes', 'greenhouse gas emissions', 'atmospheric composition', 'air quality monitoring', 'stable isotope analysis', 'atmospheric inversion modeling', 'tall tower measurements']
authors: T. J. Griffis;Z. Yu;J. M. Baker;D. B. Millet
title: Isotopic Constraints on Nitrous Oxide Emissions From the US Corn Belt
abstract: Agriculture is the dominant source of anthropogenic nitrous oxide (N2O) –a greenhouse gas and a stratospheric ozone depleting substance. The US Corn Belt is a large global N2O source, but there remain large uncertainties regarding its source attribution and biogeochemical pathways. Here, we interpret high frequency stable N2O isotope observations from a very tall tower to improve our understanding of regional source attribution. We detected significant seasonal variability in δ15Nbulk (6.47–7.33‰) and the isotope site preference (δ15NSP = δ15Nα–δ15Nβ, 18.22–25.19‰) indicating a predominance of denitrification during the growing period but of nitrification during the snowmelt period. Isotope mixing models and atmospheric inversions both indicate that indirect emissions contribute substantially (>35%) to total N2O emissions. Despite the relatively large uncertainties, the upper bound of bottom‐up indirect emission estimates are at the lower bound of the isotopic constraint, implying significant discrepancies that require further investigation.

explanation: 这篇研究论文探讨了长期暴露于PM2.5成分与绿地空间（通过NDVI指标表示）与关节炎和类风湿性关节炎风险之间的关联。研究使用了队列数据，应用广义线性混合效应模型和分位数g计算法等统计方法，分析了PM2.5不同成分（包括黑碳）的暴露水平与疾病风险之间的剂量-反应关系，以及PM2.5暴露与绿地空间的交互作用。结果表明，PM2.5成分的暴露会增加关节炎和类风湿性关节炎的风险，其中黑碳成分的影响最为显著。PM2.5、有机物、硝酸盐和铵盐的暴露与疾病风险之间呈现“U”型或“J”型曲线关系。绿地空间（NDVI）的减少也与关节炎风险的增加相关。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它研究了PM2.5这种大气成分对人体健康的影响，并利用NDVI（归一化植被指数），一个常通过卫星遥感获得的指标，来评估绿地空间对这种影响的调节作用。  虽然文章没有直接提及具体的卫星或传感器类型，但其研究方法和数据分析与利用卫星遥感数据进行空气质量监测和大气成分分析的研究方向高度一致。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'Black carbon', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Satellite observation (NDVI)', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Epidemiology']
authors: Yi‐Sheng He;Yi‐Qing Xu;Fan Cao;Zhao‐Xing Gao;Man Ge;Tian He;Peng Zhang;Chan‐Na Zhao;Peng Wang;Zhiwei Xu;Hai‐Feng Pan
title: Association of Long‐Term Exposure to PM2.5 Constituents and Green Space With Arthritis and Rheumatoid Arthritis
abstract: There is limited evidence regarding the effects of long‐term exposure to PM2.5 constituents on the risk of arthritis and rheumatoid arthritis, and the interaction between PM2.5 and green space remains unclear. This study examined the relationship between long‐term exposure to PM2.5 constituents and the risk of arthritis and rheumatoid arthritis, with the exposure period extending from recruitment until self‐reported outcomes, death, loss to follow‐up, or end of follow‐up. Additionally, the study assessed whether there was an interactive effect between PM2.5 and green space on these risks. We gathered cohort data on 18,649 individuals aged ≥45 years. We applied generalized linear mixed‐effects models to estimate the effects of PM2.5 constituents, NDVI, and their interaction on arthritis and rheumatoid arthritis. The quantile g‐computation and weighted quantile sum regression model were applied to estimate the combined effect of PM2.5 constituents. Our results showed that exposure to single and mixed PM2.5 constituents adversely affected arthritis and rheumatoid arthritis, and was mainly attributed to the black carbon component. We observed “U” or “J” shaped exposure‐response curves for the effects of PM2.5, OM, NO3− and NH4+ exposure on the development of arthritis/rheumatoid arthritis. Additionally, the odds ratio of arthritis for per interquartile range (IQR) increase in PM2.5 was 1.209 (95% CI:1.198, 1.221), per 0.1‐unit decrease in NDVI was 1.091 (95% CI:1.033, 1.151), and the interaction term was 1.005 (95% CI:1.002, 1.007). These findings flesh out the existing evidence for PM2.5 constituents, NDVI and arthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, but the underlying mechanisms still require further exploration.

explanation: 这篇论文利用CMIP6大型集成数据集，研究了20世纪和21世纪气候变化背景下南极洲和南大洋极端季节的演变。它关注的是极端季节（低10%和高90%百分位数）的多种变量变化，而不是平均气候变化。结果显示，冬季变暖在寒冷极端事件中最为显著，夏季降水和西风极端事件的增加在臭氧洞形成时期（20世纪后期）尤为明显，主要影响沿海地区和南极半岛。中纬度地区夏季风极端事件的范围则有所减小。文中探讨了海冰退缩和西风急流位置等机制。虽然文章没有直接提及具体的遥感技术或传感器，但其研究的气候变量（风、降水、海冰、温度、臭氧等）以及对南极地区气候变化的研究，都与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。例如，卫星观测可以提供大范围的温度、风场、海冰覆盖范围和大气成分数据，这些数据对于验证和改进气候模型至关重要，并有助于理解论文中提到的极端季节变化机制。
topic_words: ['wind', 'precipitation', 'sea ice', 'temperature', 'westerly jet', 'ozone', 'climate change', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Thomas J. Bracegirdle;Thomas Caton Harrison;Caroline R. Holmes;Hua Lu;Patrick Martineau;Tony Phillips
title: Antarctic extreme seasons under 20<sup>th</sup> and 21<sup>st</sup> century climate change
abstract:
Antarctic extreme seasons under 20<sup>th</sup> and 21<sup>st</sup> century climate change 
 In this study, available large ensemble datasets in the Coupled Model Intercomparison Phase 6 (CMIP6) archive were used to provide the first multi-variate overview of the evolution of extreme seasons over Antarctica and the Southern Ocean during the 20th and 21st centuries following medium-to-high radiative forcing scenarios. The results show significant differences between simulated changes in background mean climate and changes in low (10th percentile) and high (90th percentile) extreme seasons. Regional winter warming is most pronounced for cold extremes. In summer, there are more pronounced increases in high extremes in precipitation and westerly wind during the ozone hole formation period (late 20th century), affecting coastal regions and, in particular, the Antarctic Peninsula. At midlatitudes, there is a reduction in the range of summer season wind extremes. Suggested mechanisms for these differences are provided relating to sea ice retreat and westerly jet position.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了印度夏季风期间低到高强度降雨事件的时空变化，以及气候变化的影响。研究使用了印度气象局（IMD）的观测数据和五个协调区域气候降尺度实验（CORDEX）区域气候模式（RCM）。结果表明，近几十年来，印度部分地区的降雨总量和事件频率有所下降，而其他地区则有所增加。CORDEX模式高估了历史时期强降雨区的降雨总量，为了提高模拟精度，研究采用了一种基于百分位数的偏差校正技术。未来预测表明，印度夏季风降雨总量可能不会发生显著变化，但极端和强降雨事件的频率可能会增加，而中等强度降雨事件的频率可能会下降。该研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，因为它使用了卫星观测数据（IMD的降雨数据，虽然没有明确指出是哪种卫星，但这类数据通常来源于气象卫星）来分析降雨事件，并利用气候模式进行预测，这与大气成分分析和气候变化研究密切相关。
topic_words: ['Rainfall', 'Precipitation', 'Extreme rainfall events', 'Summer monsoon', 'Climate change', 'CORDEX models', 'Satellite observations', 'Bias correction', 'IMD rainfall data']
authors: Alugula Boyaj;Palash Sinha;U.C. Mohanty;V. Vinoj;Karumuri Ashok;Sahidul Islam;A. Kaginalkar;M. Khare
title: Projected frequency of low to high-intensity rainfall events over India using bias-corrected CORDEX models
abstract:
•Rainfall totals and event frequencies have decreased significantly in monsoon core zones, J&K, and parts of northeastern, while increasing in northwestern India, the Western Ghats, and southern regions in the recent era. •All CORDEX RCMs overestimate the total rainfall of ISM in heavy rainfall zones during the historical period by approximately 10–30 %. •Bias-corrected CORDEX RCMs underestimated (overestimated) ISM rainfall events in high (non-high) rainfall zones. Some corrected CORDEX models closely aligned with IMD observations for rainfall trends across regions. •Future projections indicate that there will be no significant changes in ISM total rainfall, but the frequency of total EREs will increase while moderate rainfall events decrease across India. 
 Heavy rainfall events and associated floods have emerged as one of the great threats to society that mainly manifested due the climate change. The Indian summer monsoon (ISM) contributes 80 % of annual rainfall and is characterized mainly by high-intensity rainfall events (HiREs) in the recent era. We investigated the spatiotemporal variability of HiREs from a climate change perspective by accessing the India Meteorological Department's (IMD) observed daily gridded rainfall dataset (0.25° × 0.25°) from 1961 to 2020 during the ISM season. Our observational analysis shows that the ISM total and the frequency of low- to high-intensity rainfall events have significantly decreased mostly over the central northeastern, Jammu and Kashmir, and some places in the northeastern and central parts of India. However, they have significantly increased over Gujarat, the northwestern, the Western Ghats, and the southern parts of India during the present climate period (1991–2020) compared to the past climate period (1961–1990). Furthermore, we explored the fidelity of five Coordinated Regional Climate Downscaling Experiments (CORDEX) Regional Climate Models (RCMs) in simulating the spatiotemporal variability of ISM total rainfall and the frequency of low- to high-intensity rainfall events over India during the historical (1976–2005) and future periods (2006–2100). All CORDEX RCMs overestimate the ISM total rainfall over India's heavy rainfall zones during the historical period by ∼10–30 % compared to IMD observations. To improve CORDEX RCM's skills in simulating the frequency of low- to high-intensity rainfall events, we employed a percentile-based bias correction technique. Compared to non-bias-corrected outputs from the RCMs, the quantile-bias-corrected method significantly enhanced the probability of detection rate (hit rate) in all studied models for extreme, heavy, and moderate rainfall events, excluding light rainfall events. Interestingly, the improvement is greater for extreme events, followed by heavy and moderate rainfall events. The composite hit rate of all the models shows 381 %, 146 %, and 44 % improvement for extreme, heavy, and moderate events, respectively. It is noticed that the CCCMA model performed better than the other four CORDEX models in capturing the spatial patterns of ISM total rainfall and the frequency of total extreme and heavy rainfall events over higher rainfall zones in India. Additionally, this study suggests that there will likely be no significant changes in ISM total rainfall over India in the future, but the frequency of total extreme and heavy rainfall events will most likely increase, while the frequency of moderate rainfall events will likely decrease mostly over southern parts of India in future projections.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了气候变化和空气污染对印度未来光伏发电潜力的影响。它使用了CMIP6气候模型，在两种情景下（SSP2-4.5和SSP5-8.5）评估了2041-2050年印度电网的光伏发电潜力。结果表明，气候变化将导致光伏发电潜力下降，主要原因是辐射减少和温度升高，这与大气成分（气溶胶等）的变化密切相关，也与卫星观测到的气候变化数据有关。虽然文中没有直接提到具体的卫星传感器，但其研究方法依赖于气候模型的模拟结果，这些模型通常会整合来自卫星观测的数据。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术，特别是空气质量监测和气候变化监测，密切相关。研究结果强调了同时进行气候变化和空气污染减排以提高印度光伏发电潜力的必要性。
topic_words: ['Aerosol', 'Air pollution', 'Temperature', 'Solar radiation', 'Satellite observation', 'Climate models', 'Photovoltaic efficiency']
authors: Sushovan Ghosh;Dilip Ganguly;Sagnik Dey;Subhojit Ghoshal Chowdhury
title: Future photovoltaic potential in India: navigating the interplay between air pollution control and climate change mitigation
abstract: India has set ambitious solar energy targets to meet its climate commitments. However, climate change, already evident in the country, poses significant challenges to solar power generation. Therefore, assessing the impact of climate change on future photovoltaic potential in India is essential. This study evaluates the mid-century (2041–2050) solar photovoltaic potential across Indian power grids using CMIP6 models under two scenarios: SSP2-4.5 (moderate climate action with intermediate air pollution) and SSP5-8.5 (weak climate action with strong air pollution control). The results indicate that the nationally averaged photovoltaic potential is projected to decrease by −2.3 ± 0.6% (SSP5-8.5) to −3.3 ± 0.9% (SSP2-4.5) compared to the 1985–2014 baseline, primarily due to reduced radiation and increased temperatures. Additionally, cell temperatures are expected to rise by 1.5 ± 0.13 °C (SSP2-4.5) to 2 ± 0.11 °C (SSP5-8.5), leading to efficiency losses and additional 18 ± 5 d under SSP2-4.5 (26 ± 3 d under SSP5-8.5) of efficiency de-rating, particularly in solar-rich regions. This translates to a loss of 600 ± 160 GWh under SSP2-4.5 and 840 ± 100 GWh under SSP5-8.5, based on the solar generation status of 2023–24. Overall, SSP5-8.5 projects a smaller reduction in photovoltaic potential, it also predicts greater temperature-induced efficiency losses compared to SSP2-4.5, due to aerosol direct effect and weak climate action. Finally, this assessment highlights the need for combined climate and pollution mitigation efforts to boost India’s photovoltaic potential and secure a sustainable, resilient energy future.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用光学特性反演老化黑碳气溶胶涂层材料的折射率和含水量。黑碳气溶胶是重要的气溶胶成分，其吸湿性增长会影响其光学特性和气候效应。该研究提出了一种基于等效复折射率反演涂层含水量的方法，并通过理论分析验证了该方法的可行性。研究结果表明，散射特性在反演折射率和含水量方面表现最佳，对于高相对湿度下涂层较厚的老化黑碳气溶胶，反演误差较小。该研究为利用遥感技术监测黑碳气溶胶的含水量提供了理论基础，对大气环境遥感技术，特别是空气质量监测和卫星观测具有重要意义，有助于更准确地分析大气成分和预测气候变化。
topic_words: ['Black carbon aerosol', 'Aerosol optical properties', 'Water content', 'Refractive index', 'Remote sensing', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Satellite observations', 'Atmospheric composition']
authors: Jia Liu;Cancan Zhu;Donghui Zhou;Jinbao Han
title: Retrieval of refractive index and water content for the coating materials of aged black carbon aerosol based on optical properties: a theoretical analysis
abstract:
The hydrophilic coatings of aged black carbon (BC) particles absorb moisture during the hygroscopic growth process, but it is difficult to characterize how much water is absorbed under different relative humidities (RHs). In this study, we propose a method to obtain the water content in the coatings based on the equivalent complex refractive index retrieved from optical properties. This method is verified from a theoretical perspective, and it performs well for thickly coated BC at high RHs. 
 Water content in the coatings of aged black carbon (BC) aerosol can be reflected through the complex refractive index. In this study, the retrieval of the refractive index and water content for  non-absorbing coatings of BC aerosol during  hygroscopic growth (RH = 0 %–95 %) based on scattering and absorption properties is theoretically investigated. Optical properties of morphologically realistic fractal BC aerosols are simulated using the multiple-sphere T-matrix method (MSTM), the optical equivalent refractive index of coating material is retrieved based on the Mie theory, and the water content in coatings is further retrieved using effective medium theory. Results show that the scattering property performs best in retrieving the refractive index and water content. The retrieval errors of the refractive index of heavily aged BC aerosols are less than 10 % at high relative humidities (RHs), while partially coated BC and thinly coated BC have larger errors. The regularity of retrieved water content is similar to that of the refractive index retrieved, and the retrieved water content errors range from 2 % to 63 % for heavily coated BC. This study provides a helpful optical method to obtain the water content of BC coatings.

explanation: 这篇论文综述了全球范围内户外低成本气相空气质量传感器网络的部署情况。它分析了60个传感器网络和17个相关项目，重点关注其特点、趋势和局限性。研究发现，与颗粒物（PM）相比，气相测量数据的可用性仍然不足，地理覆盖范围也存在差距，尤其是在全球南方和农村地区。论文将地面传感器网络分为准永久性和短期/中期两种类型，并探讨了常见做法、优势和劣势。最后，论文总结了传感器网络数据统一和质量控制工作。总的来说，这篇论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它关注的是利用地面传感器网络进行空气质量监测，这属于大气成分分析的一个重要方面。
topic_words: ['gas-phase air pollutants', 'low-cost sensors', 'air quality monitoring', 'ground-based sensor networks', 'spatial coverage', 'data accessibility']
authors: Kristen Okorn;Laura T. Iraci
title: An overview of outdoor low-cost gas-phase air quality sensor deployments: current efforts, trends, and limitations
abstract:
We reviewed 60 sensor networks and 17 related efforts (sensor review papers and data accessibility projects) to better understand the landscape of stationary low-cost gas-phase sensor networks deployed in outdoor environments worldwide. Gaps in monitoring efforts include the availability of gas-phase measurements compared to particulate matter (PM) and geographic coverage gaps (the Global South, rural areas). We conclude with a summary of cross-network unification and quality control efforts. 
 We reviewed 60 sensor networks and 17 related efforts (sensor review papers and data accessibility projects) to better understand the landscape of stationary low-cost gas-phase sensor networks deployed in outdoor environments worldwide. This study is not exhaustive of every gas-phase sensor network on the globe but rather exists to categorize types of sensor networks by their key characteristics and explore general trends. This also exposes gaps in monitoring efforts to date, especially regarding the availability of gas-phase measurements compared to particulate matter (PM) and geographic coverage gaps (the Global South, rural areas). We categorize ground-based networks that measure gas-phase air pollutants into two main subsets based on their deployment type – quasi-permanent (long term) and campaign (short to medium term) – and explore commonplace practices, strengths, and weaknesses of stationary monitoring networks. We conclude with a summary of cross-network unification and quality control efforts. This work aims to help scientists looking to build a sensor network explore best practices and common pathways and aid end users in finding low-cost sensor datasets that meet their needs.

explanation: 这篇论文关注的是改进社区地球系统模型 (CESM) 中的气溶胶模拟，重点是粉尘、海盐和海洋一次有机气溶胶 (MPOA) 的排放以及二次有机气溶胶 (SOA) 的形成。研究者更新了粉尘排放方案，使其更连续，提高了北美和副极地地区的模拟精度；对海盐排放进行了湿度校正，但影响较小；引入了与海洋生物地球化学过程耦合的海洋有机气溶胶排放，并增加了 SOA 水相反应过程。模型改进后，能够更好地模拟不同类型浮游植物对 MPOA 排放的影响，以及水相反应对 SOA 浓度的贡献。这些改进增强了 CESM 模拟大气气溶胶及其对气候和环境影响的能力。虽然论文本身并非直接描述遥感技术，但其改进的气溶胶模拟结果可以与卫星观测数据进行比较和验证，从而提高大气成分分析和空气质量监测的精度，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['Aerosol', 'Atmospheric Composition', 'Air Quality', 'Satellite Observation', 'Climate Modeling', 'Dust', 'Sea Salt', 'Secondary Organic Aerosol (SOA)', 'Marine Organic Aerosol (MPOA)', 'Community Earth System Model (CESM)']
authors: Yujuan Wang;Peng Zhang;Jie Li;Yaman Liu;Yanxu Zhang;Jiawei Li;Zhiwei Han
title: An updated aerosol simulation in the Community Earth System Model (v2.1.3): dust and marine aerosol emissions and secondary organic aerosol formation
abstract:
This study updates the CESM's aerosol schemes, focusing on dust, marine aerosol emissions, and secondary organic aerosol (SOA) . Dust emission modifications make deflation areas more continuous, improving results in North America and the sub-Arctic. Humidity correction to sea-salt emissions has a minor effect. Introducing marine organic aerosol emissions, coupled with ocean biogeochemical processes, and adding aqueous reactions for SOA formation advance the CESM's aerosol modelling results. 
 Aerosols constitute important substance components of the Earth's atmosphere and have a profound influence on climate dynamics, radiative properties, and biogeochemical processes. Here we introduce updated emission schemes for dust, sea-salt, and marine primary organic aerosols (MPOA), as well as augmented secondary organic aerosol (SOA) formation pathways within the Community Earth System Model (CESM; version 2.1.3). The modified dust emission scheme shifts the original hotspot-like dust emission to a more continuous distribution, improving the dust aerosol optical depth (DAOD) simulations at stations in north Africa and central Asia. This update also reduces dust residence time from 4.1 to 1.6 d, enhancing concentration simulations downwind of dust source regions. For sea-salt emissions, we incorporate an updated sea surface temperature (SST) modulation and introduce a relative-humidity-dependent correction factor for sea-salt particle size, with SST having a significantly larger impact on sea-salt emissions (16.1 %) compared to the minor effect of humidity (−0.3 %). We then extend our modelling to incorporate emissions of marine primary organic aerosols (MPOA) as mixed externally with sea-salt aerosols, coupled offline with the ocean component Parallel Ocean Program (POP2). The results underscore the substantial influence of phytoplankton diversity on MPOA emissions, with 148 % variability simulated among different phytoplankton types, highlighting the role of biological variability in aerosol modelling. Furthermore, we refine the model's chemical mechanisms by including the irreversible aqueous uptake of dicarbonyl compounds as a new pathway for SOA formation, contributing an additional 37 % to surface SOA concentrations. These improvements enrich the ability of the CESM to use intricate linkages between different components of the Earth system, thereby enabling a more comprehensive description of natural aerosol emissions, chemical processes, and their impacts.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了臭氧和温度与缺血性心脏病死亡率之间的关系。研究使用了广义相加模型和meta分析，结果表明臭氧和温度升高都与缺血性心脏病死亡率增加相关，两者之间还存在交互作用和中介效应。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为准确的臭氧和温度数据通常依赖于空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等技术。例如，卫星搭载的光谱仪可以用来监测大气中的臭氧浓度，地面传感器可以测量温度和臭氧浓度。这些数据对于研究大气污染物对人体健康的影响至关重要。
topic_words: ['Ozone', 'Temperature', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Satellite observations', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Mortality risk', 'Ischemic heart disease', 'Ground-based sensors']
authors: Xing Gong;Fengxia Sun;Li Wei;Yi Zhang;Minjie Xia;Ming Ge;Lilin Xiong
title: Association of Ozone and Temperature with Ischemic Heart Disease Mortality Risk: Mediation and Interaction Analyses
abstract: Global warming and elevated ozone (O3) levels are gradually gaining widespread attention, and exposure to which may cause many physiological changes associated with cardiovascular events such as hypertension, cardiomyocyte apoptosis, etc. In addition, ischemic heart disease (IHD) is the leading cause of death worldwide. However, the contributions of temperature and O3, independently or in combination, to IHD mortality are not well understood. This study employs a two-stage analytical protocol (generalized additive model followed by meta-analysis) to explore the respective associations of temperature and O3 with IHD mortality, and determine their possible mediation and interaction effects. Our results suggest that increases of 10 μg/m3 in O3 and 1 °C in temperature at lag01 day are associated with increased IHD mortality risks of 0.789% and 0.686%, respectively. O3 can mediate the relationship between temperature and IHD mortality, with a pooled estimate of 0.140%, while temperature can mediate the association between O3 and IHD mortality, with a pooled estimate of 0.162%. The additive and multiplicative interaction effects of O3 and temperature were significantly associated with IHD mortality. The study findings demonstrate that higher temperature and O3 concentrations can increase human IHD mortality risk through interaction and mediation effects, providing a scientific basis for the synergistic management of temperature and O3 or associated interventions.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了棕色碳气溶胶的光学特性与其化学成分之间的关系。研究人员通过分析西安地区采集的样品中38种典型发色团的贡献，建立了一个机器学习模型，用于预测棕色碳气溶胶的光学特性，例如吸收系数和质量吸收效率。模型的准确性很高，能够解释光学特性的大部分变化，并揭示了多环芳烃和含氧多环芳烃等物质对棕色碳气溶胶光学特性的重要影响。该研究成果有助于更深入地理解棕色碳气溶胶的光学特性及其对大气环境的影响，并为改进大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测和卫星观测等提供参考。  这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为棕色碳气溶胶是影响大气辐射平衡和空气质量的重要组分，对其光学特性的准确预测对于改进大气环境遥感模型和提高监测精度至关重要。
topic_words: ['Brown Carbon Aerosol', 'Light Absorption', 'Aerosol Optical Properties', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Atmospheric Composition', 'Satellite Observation', 'Spectroscopic Techniques']
authors: Ying Wang;Ru-Jin Huang;Haobin Zhong;Ting Wang;Lu Yang;Wei Yuan;Wei Xu;Zhisheng An
title: Predictions of the Optical Properties of Brown Carbon Aerosol by Machine Learning with Typical Chromophores
abstract: The linkages between BrC optical properties and chemical composition remain inadequately understood, with quantified chromophores explaining less than 25% of ambient aerosol light absorption. This study characterized 38 typical chromophores in aerosols collected in Xi’an, with light absorption contributions to BrC ranging from 1.6 ± 0.3 to 5.8 ± 2.6% at 365 nm. Based on these quantified chromophores, an interpretable machine learning model and the Shapley Additive Explanation (SHAP) method were employed to explore the relationships between BrC optical properties and chemical composition. The model attained high accuracy with Pearson correlation coefficients (r) exceeding 0.93 for the absorption coefficient (Absλ) and surpassing 0.57 for mass absorption efficiency (MAEλ) of BrC. It explains more than 80% of the variance in Abs and over 50% in MAE, significantly improving the understanding of BrC light absorption. Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) and oxygenated PAHs (OPAHs) with four and five rings exhibit significant positive effects on Absλ, suggesting that similar unidentified chromophores may also notably impact BrC optical characteristics. The model based on chromophore mass concentrations further simplifies studying BrC optical characteristics. This study advances understanding of the relationship between BrC composition and optical properties and guides the investigation of unrecognized chromophores.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了南极冰盖融水对全球大气系统的影响。它使用耦合气候模式进行了一系列实验，结果表明南极冰盖融水导致南极洲上空从地表到对流层顶的降温，南半球极地平流层增温，以及热带对流层上层降温。这种大气热结构的变化改变了高空的急流。此外，由于海洋-大气热交换的扰动，导致一系列正反馈，主要通过地表和近地表反照率的变化改变了大气顶部的辐射平衡。研究结果突出了南极冰盖融化对气候系统的全球性影响，以及其对中纬度气候模式和区域变暖信号延迟的潜在影响。虽然文章没有直接提及具体的空气质量监测技术或卫星传感器类型，但其研究内容与大气温度、平流层成分、海冰反照率等密切相关，这些都是大气环境遥感技术关注的重点。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术具有很强的相关性，可以通过卫星观测和气候模式模拟等遥感手段来验证和扩展研究结论。
topic_words: ['Atmospheric temperature', 'Stratospheric composition', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Climate modeling', 'Antarctic meltwater', 'Sea-ice albedo', 'Jet stream']
authors: Rebecca L. Beadling;Pu Lin;John Krasting;William Ellinger;Anna Coomans;James Milward;Katherine Turner;Xiaoqi Xu;Torge Martin;Maria J. Molina
title: From the Surface to the Stratosphere: Large‐Scale Atmospheric Response to Antarctic Meltwater
abstract: The ocean response to Antarctic Ice Sheet (AIS) mass loss has been extensively studied using numerical models, but less attention has been given to the atmosphere. We examine the global atmospheric response to AIS meltwater in an ensemble of experiments performed using two fully coupled climate models under a pre‐industrial climate. In response to AIS meltwater, the experiments yield cooling from the surface to the tropopause over the subpolar Southern Ocean, warming in the Southern Hemisphere polar stratosphere, and cooling in the upper tropical troposphere. Positive feedbacks, initiated by disrupted ocean‐atmosphere heat exchange, result in a change in the top‐of‐atmosphere radiative balance caused primarily through surface and near‐surface albedo changes. Changes in the atmospheric thermal structure alter the jet streams aloft. The results highlight the global influence of AIS melting on the climate system and the potential for impacts on mid‐latitude climate patterns and delayed regional warming signals.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了准双周尺度云辐射反馈 (CRF) 对亚洲季风区极端降雨强度的调制作用。研究发现，准双周尺度的长波CRF与华南和印度北部持续性强降雨事件强度密切相关，它通过有效维持大尺度对流扰动来影响降雨。当禁用CRF时，支持极端降雨的准双周尺度对流异常会减弱。对耦合模式比较计划 (CMIP) 历史模拟的评估也证实，更准确地模拟准双周尺度长波CRF的模式在捕捉持续性强降雨的幅度方面偏差更小。该研究对改进模式模拟和预报准双周尺度CRF，从而减轻亚洲季风区极端降水事件风险具有重要意义。 这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为研究使用了观测分析和模式模拟，这需要依赖卫星观测数据来获取云和降水信息，并分析大气成分（如水汽和云）的变化。
topic_words: ['cloud radiative feedback', 'extreme rainfall', 'satellite observations', 'monsoon', 'climate modeling', 'atmospheric composition (water vapor, clouds)', 'precipitation forecasting']
authors: Hongli Chen;Pang‐Chi Hsu;Shuzhen Hu
title: Role of Quasi‐Biweekly Cloud‐Radiative Feedback in Modulating and Simulating Extreme Rainfall Intensity Over Asian Monsoon Regions
abstract: Although Cloud‐radiative feedback (CRF) has been investigated in terms of its modulation of extreme precipitation over tropical oceans, the specific timeframe of CRF variability and the associated processes driving extreme rainfall over Asian monsoon regions remain unclear. Based on observational analyses and model sensitivity experiments, this study reveals that longwave CRF at the quasi‐biweekly timescale is most closely linked to the intensity of persistent (≥3‐day) heavy rainfall events in southern China and northern India by efficiently maintaining the large‐scale convective perturbations. When CRF is disabled, the quasi‐biweekly convective anomalies supporting extreme precipitation are weakened. Additional assessments of Coupled Model Intercomparison Project historical simulations confirm that models with more accurate quasi‐biweekly longwave CRF exhibit smaller biases in capturing the amplitude of persistent heavy rainfall. These results have implications for improving model capability in simulating and forecasting quasi‐biweekly CRF to mitigate the risks of extreme precipitation events in monsoonal Asia.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了1999年至2023年期间全球电离层总电子含量（TEC）的长期趋势。研究利用国际GNSS服务提供的全球TEC地图数据，并使用太阳活动指标（如F30、F10.7或MgII）来消除太阳EUV辐射的影响。结果显示，全球大部分地区TEC呈现负趋势，这与温室效应导致的热层冷却和收缩的假设相符，尽管观测到的负趋势值比理论预期值更大。该研究使用了卫星观测数据（GNSS）分析大气成分（电离层电子密度）的变化，与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['Total Electron Content (TEC)', 'Ionosphere', 'Thermosphere', 'Greenhouse gas', 'GNSS', 'Satellite observations', 'Atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: M. Paula Natali;Anabella Urutti;Juan Manuel Castaño;Brunos S. Zossi;Trinidad Duran;Amalia Meza;Ana G. Elias
title: Long Term Global Ionospheric Total Electron Content Trend Analysis
abstract: Simulations based on physical models of the thermosphere‐ionosphere system suggest that the ionosphere will sink as the thermosphere cools and contracts in response to increasing greenhouse gas concentrations. As a consequence, long‐term trends can be expected in ionospheric parameters such as: total electron content (TEC), the critical frequency of the F2 layer, foF2, and its peak height, hmF2. Since early 1990s, foF2 and hmF2, though to a lesser extent, have been widely analyzed to find these trends. This study shows long‐term TEC trends for the period 1999–2023 from available global International GNSS service TEC maps. Using F30, F10.7 or MgII as proxies to filter out the effect of solar EUV, the trends are negative, not only for the mean global value but also for most regions with very few exceptions. This would align with the greenhouse effect hypothesis, even though our results show higher negative trend values than expected theoretically.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了微波极化观测与辐射传输模型模拟结果之间存在的差异。研究发现，微波亮温观测值与矢量辐射传输模型模拟值之间存在约2倍的差异。论文指出，这种差异与仪器定标过程有关。极化仪器的定标过程中，实际使用的辐射值是理论值的2倍，导致亮温模拟结果与观测结果不符。论文通过模拟三种圆锥扫描微波成像仪（WindSat，AMSR2和MWRI）和一种横向扫描微波探测器（AMSU-A）的观测结果验证了这一结论。由于普朗克函数的非线性特性，简单的将处理后的亮温除以2并不能完全补偿这种差异，尤其是在高频或低物理温度下。总的来说，该研究揭示了微波遥感技术中定标过程对数据准确性的重要影响，对提高大气温度等参数的遥感反演精度具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['Microwave remote sensing', 'Satellite observations', 'Atmospheric temperature', 'Radiative transfer', 'Calibration', 'WindSat', 'AMSR2', 'MWRI', 'AMSU-A', 'Polarimetry', 'Brightness temperature']
authors: Ziqiang Zhu;Fuzhong Weng
title: A Mystery of the Inconsistency Between Microwave Polarimetric Observations and Radiative Transfer Simulations
abstract: A factor of 2 difference is found between microwave brightness temperature (TB) observations and simulations from vector radiative transfer models. A physical explanation of this difference is related to the calibration process. In principle, for the calibration of polarimetric instruments of a total power radiometer, the radiation should be only half of the values derived from Planck function but in the actual calibration process, a full value is used. When this full value is converted to a TB it is approximately, but not exactly, twice the TB simulated by a vector radiative transfer model. This inconsistency is verified by simulations of three conically scanning microwave imagers (WindSat, AMSR2 and MWRI) and one cross‐track scanning microwave sounder (AMSU‐A). This difference cannot be compensated simply by dividing a factor of 2 to the processed TBs, especially at high frequencies or at low physical temperatures due to the nonlinear property of Planck function.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了卷云和层积云的微物理特性及其与云凝结核（CCN）之间的关系，特别是CCN谱的单峰和双峰分布对云滴浓度、尺寸分布和降雨的影响。研究发现，在层云中，双峰CCN谱与较高的云滴浓度、较窄的分布和较少的降雨相关，而在积云中则相反。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为CCN是影响云的形成和发展的重要因素，而云的特性可以通过卫星遥感等技术进行观测。通过分析云的微物理特性和气溶胶的相互作用，可以更好地理解云对气候变化的影响，并提高大气环境监测和预测的精度。研究还考虑了不同CCN浓度和云类型（层云和积云）对云微物理和降雨的影响，这对于改进气候模型和提高天气预报的准确性具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['Cloud microphysics', 'Aerosol', 'CCN', 'Cloud condensation nuclei', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Drizzle', 'Stratus clouds', 'Stratocumulus clouds', 'Indirect aerosol effect', 'Atmospheric composition', 'Cloud properties']
authors: James G. Hudson;Stephen Noble
title: Stratus and Stratocumulus Cloud Microphysics and Drizzle Relationships With CCN Modality
abstract: High resolution extended‐range cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) spectral comparisons with cloud microphysics and drizzle of the Physics of Stratocumulus Tops (POST) field experiment confirmed results in the Marine Stratus/Stratocumulus Experiment (MASE). Both of these stratus cloud projects demonstrated that bimodal CCN spectra typically caused by cloud processing were associated with clouds that exhibited higher concentrations of smaller droplets with narrower distributions and less drizzle than clouds associated with unimodal CCN spectra. Resulting brighter clouds and increased cloudiness could enhance both indirect aerosol effects (IAE). These stratus findings are opposite of analogous measurements in two cumulus cloud projects, which showed bimodal CCN associated with fewer larger droplets more broadly distributed and with more drizzle than clouds associated with unimodal CCN. Resulting reduced cumulus brightness and cloudiness could reduce both IAE. Physics of Stratocumulus Tops (POST) flights in air masses with higher CCN concentrations, NCCN, showed more extremes of the stratus characteristics. However, POST flights with lower NCCN showed opposite droplet characteristics similar to the cumulus clouds, yet still showed less drizzle in clouds associated with bimodal CCN, but not as much less as the flights with higher NCCN. Since all MASE clouds were in polluted air masses, while the two cumulus projects were in clean air masses we deduce from these four projects that both the dynamic stratus/cumulus differences (vertical wind) and NCCN are responsible for the microphysics and drizzle differences among these projects. This is because the clean POST characteristics are a hybrid between MASE/POST high NCCN and the two cumulus projects.

explanation: 这篇论文探讨了城市作为人类-地球系统中关键要素的复杂性及其对地球系统的影响。虽然摘要没有直接提及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等具体技术，但其研究主题与之密切相关。论文强调了改进城市研究以应对气候变化挑战的四个关键维度，其中包括基于精细尺度人类和生态数据进行的公平性评估，这需要依赖包括大气环境遥感技术在内的多种数据来源。此外，论文提到的解决方案导向型研究、知识的共同生产以及人类与自然系统更好的整合，都与利用遥感技术进行大气环境监测和分析息息相关。因此，虽然论文没有明确提及具体的遥感技术，但其研究内容与大气环境遥感技术在城市环境研究中的应用具有高度的相关性。
topic_words: ['air quality', 'satellite observations', 'urban pollution', 'atmospheric composition', 'climate change', 'environmental monitoring']
authors: Christa Brelsford;Andrew Jones;Bhartendu Pandey;Pouya Vahmani;Melissa Allen‐Dumas;Deeksha Rastogi;Kevin Sparks;Melissa Bukovsky;Iryna Dronova;Tianzhen Hong;David M. Iwaniec;Michelle E. Newcomer;Sean C. Reid;Zhonghua Zheng
title: Cities Are Concentrators of Complex, MultiSectoral Interactions Within the Human‐Earth System
abstract: Cities are concentrators of complex, multi‐sectoral interactions. As keystones in the interconnected human‐Earth system, cities have an outsized impact on the Earth system. We describe a multi‐lens framework for organizing our understanding of the complexity of urban systems and scientific research on urban systems, which may be useful for natural system scientists exploring the ways their work can be made more actionable. We then describe four critical dimensions along which improvements are needed to advance the urban research that addresses urgent climate challenges: (a) solutions‐oriented research, (b) equity‐centered assessments which rely on fine‐scale human and ecological data, (c) co‐production of knowledge, and (d) better integration of human and natural systems occurring through theory, observation, and modeling.

explanation: 这篇研究论文探究了加州石油和天然气生产与COVID-19病例和死亡率之间的关联。研究者使用了2018年至2020年的石油和天然气生产数据以及2020年2月至2021年1月的COVID-19病例和死亡数据，运用空间分析方法，评估了居住在油气井1公里范围内的居民的COVID-19感染和死亡风险。论文中提到的PM2.5和NO2是大气污染物，与空气质量监测密切相关，研究结果表明，靠近油气井的地区，COVID-19的病例和死亡率可能较高，这与空气污染物暴露有关。虽然研究本身没有直接使用卫星遥感技术，但其关注的空气污染物与大气环境遥感技术监测的污染物类型相同，研究方法中的空间分析也与遥感数据处理分析方法类似，因此与大气环境遥感技术有一定的关联性。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'NO2', 'air quality monitoring', 'ambient air pollutants', 'ground-based sensors', 'ecological study', 'spatial analysis']
authors: Helena Archer;David J. X. González;Julia Walsh;Paul English;Peggy Reynolds;W. John Boscardin;Catherine Carpenter;Rachel Morello‐Frosch
title: Upstream Oil and Gas Production and Community COVID‐19 Case and Mortality Rates in California, USA
abstract: Higher concentrations of ambient air pollutants, including PM2.5 and NO2, and other pollutants have been found near active oil and gas wells and may be associated with adverse COVID‐19 outcomes. We assessed whether residential exposure to nearby oil and gas production was associated with higher rates of the respiratory infection COVID‐19 and related mortality using a population‐based ecological study in California. Using gridded population estimates, we estimated area‐level exposure to annual average oil and gas production volume from active wells within 1 kilometer (km) of populated areas within census block groups from 2018 to 2020. We geocoded confirmed cases and associated deaths to assess block group case and mortality rates from COVID‐19 from February 2020 to January 2021. We fit hierarchical Poisson models with individual and area covariates (e.g., age, sex, socioeconomic disadvantage), and included time and other interactions to assess additional variation (e.g., testing, reporting rates). In the first 4 months of the study period (February–May 2020), block groups in the highest tertile of oil and gas production exposure had 34% higher case rates (IRR: 1.34 95% CI: 1.20, 1.49) and 55% higher mortality rates (MRR: 1.52 95%: CI: 1.14, 2.03) than those with no estimated production, after accounting for area‐level covariates. Over the entire study period, we observed moderately higher mortality rates in the highest group (MRR: 1.16 95%: CI: 1.01, 1.33) and null associations for case rates.

explanation: 这篇研究论文的标题和摘要表明，其与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。论文关注私人飞机排放的温室气体迅速增长的问题。这与大气成分分析，特别是温室气体（如二氧化碳和甲烷）的监测直接相关。可以使用卫星遥感技术和大气成分分析技术来监测和量化私人飞机的排放，并评估其对空气质量的影响。因此，该研究可以使用卫星观测数据（例如，来自地球观测卫星的温室气体浓度数据）以及地面空气质量监测数据来分析私人飞机排放的时空分布及其环境影响。

explanation: 这篇论文研究了亚马逊雨林冠层内频繁降雨诱导的新粒子形成。研究发现，降雨通过清除较大的颗粒物并将富含臭氧的空气带入雨林冠层，从而导致纳米颗粒的爆发。这与雨林冠层内气溶胶、痕量气体和气象数据有关。该研究使用了亚马逊高塔观测站的综合数据，揭示了降雨如何定期诱导成核尺寸范围内纳米颗粒的爆发。这可能是由于降雨相关的清除作用减少了凝结汇，以及臭氧注入森林冠层，增加了生物挥发性有机化合物（特别是萜烯）的氧化，从而增强了新粒子的形成。研究结果表明，降雨相关的凝结汇减少、森林冠层气体（主要是萜烯）和颗粒物的一次排放以及对流云的处理过程共同决定了原始雨林空气中云凝结核的数量。降雨诱导的纳米颗粒爆发为云凝结核的形成提供了一种合理的解释，并导致了当地绿色海洋云和降水的形成。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及到气溶胶、臭氧等大气成分的分析，以及对气溶胶粒子数浓度和粒径分布的观测，这可以通过卫星遥感、激光雷达等技术实现。研究结果可以用于改进气候模型，提高对亚马逊地区乃至全球气候变化的预测精度。
